title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930s
medium:
Medium: wool, beads, rhinestones
Technique: embroidery, beading
description: Purple plain weave fabric cut in oval shape is worked in purple and gold seed beads, gold round beads, purple rhinestones, and purple cord.
